oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Mantis and his son in law /kw mmana are both to be seen in the rainbow, the Mantis uppermost and /kw mmana underneath. (L VIII.
7. 6600 rev. & 6601 rev.). |kaggen (the Mantis) and |kwammana can be seen in the rainbow and are the same colour as the part they live in. The people call the rainbow by |kwammana's name.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rainbow (|kaggen and !kwammana)
